room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: We took a group of teenage girls and they loved it.  Staff was superb and the Kidnapping game was fun, engaging and well designed with just enough suspense all the way to the end.   Girls had a terrific time which they are still talking about... Will definitely come back and highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: Went with my older teen sons and we all thoroughly enjoyed it! It was suspenseful from beginning to end. Highly recommend this event.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: Well worth it! We had so much fun in the Kidnapping Room, and all the staff were very nice. The man who took our reservation over the phone was especially cool. We are definitely coming back.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: Had a blast every time. Each room has a unique feel and a variety of puzzles.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: So much fun! The staff was great. Design of both the room and the puzzles were well done. Will definitely be returning to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: Awesome and helpful staff. Easy to find. We played the Hostage and Kidnapping rooms. Tough, but very creative puzzles in both. I had an absolute blast! Will definitely be checking out the other rooms they have.
